title: Hate Speech
body: So, what does one do when there is another summoner in the game telling them to kill oneself? I have the messages screenshotted, and I really don't think people that talk this way should be allowed to play in this game or use chat.

replies.body: If only riot actually looked at the reports for hate speech..
Seriously. It seems as though they've switched completely to automated busters.

The automated systems are extremely accurate and more likely to find something than people manually going through reports (which would cause an eternal backlog). Report them for hate speech, and the systems will do what they are designed to do.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=qiB5fIsE,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-09T23:24:14.682+0000)
>
> The automated systems are extremely accurate and more likely to find something than people manually going through reports (which would cause an eternal backlog). Report them for hate speech, and the systems will do what they are designed to do.

I have asked this multiple times but NOT about when it comes to the automated system;
Do words such as the "C" word (Rhymes with bracker) apply as strong of a reaction from the system as words like the "N" word ? (Rhymes with Trigger).... "Misogynist" as punished as those as well?

It seems that the system is very selective as to what constitutes "Hate Speech" rather than being just and equitable with dishing out respective punishment for all hatred-fueled words.
